Key Match Events: Conor Bradley was adjudged to have been offside when he blasted the ball into the net
Fedor Lapoukhov produced an excellent stop from a powerful Jamie Reid header
Shea Charles delivered a free-kick into the danger zone and Eoin Toal rose highest and was unlucky to see his header come back off the post
Post-Match Reflections: Michael O’Neill’s side had the bulk of the chances in the UEFA Nations League encounter but could not find the net
It’s as you were in the group after Bulgaria drew 0-0 with Luxembourg at home earlier today
Miscellaneous Highlights: Northern Ireland, who had 61% possession in the game, had 15 attempts on goal compared to Belarus’ seven in the UNL League C Group 3 clash
Pierce Charles gave a senior debut to goalkeeper Pierce Charles from the start
Lee Bonis made his debut for Northern Ireland, replacing Reid in the 76th minute
Others: The game was played at the ZTE Arena in the city of Zalaegerszeg in western Hungary
The two sides cancelling each other out led to a goalless draw
